introduction: Overview (4)Born	July 23, 1964 in Ashford, Kent, England, UKBirth Name	Matilda F. E. ZieglerNickname	MattyHeight	5' 5" (1.65 m)Mini Bio (1)Matilda Ziegler was born on July 23, 1964 in Ashford, Kent, England as Matilda F. E. Ziegler. She is an actress, known for Lark Rise to Candleford (2008), EastEnders (1985) and In Suspicious Circumstances (1991). She has been married to Louis Hilyer since July 2004. They have three children.Spouse (1)Louis Hilyer	(July 2004 - present) ( 3 children)Trivia (5)Sister of Dominic Ziegler, journalist and Japan bureau chief for the Economist.Gave birth to her 1st child at age 32, a daughter Evie Joy Hilyer in March 1997. Child's father is her partner [now husband], Louis Hilyer.Gave birth to her 2nd child at age 36, a daughter Faye Berry Hilyer in November 2000. Child's father is her partner [now husband], Louis Hilyer.Gave birth to her 3rd child at age 40, a son Herbert Carl Hilyer in April 2005. Child's father is her husband, Louis Hilyer.Is one of fifteen regular EastEnders (1985) actors to have appeared on Call the Midwife (2012) either in a main or a guest starring role. The others are Cliff Parisi, Lorraine Stanley, Tilly Vosburgh, Lacey Turner, Jenna Russell, Kacey Ainsworth, Ted Reilly, Jasmyn Banks, Danny Walters, Lucy Speed, Kate Williams, Anita Dobson, Maggie O'Neill and Scarlett Alice Johnson. Of these fifteen, Ziegler is one of eleven actors to have appeared on Call the Midwife (2012) after appearing on EastEnders (1985).
